segments.text: Let's come to an agreement to salary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I see the agreement first ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . Here you are . Please read the agreement and sign it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ( Read the agreement . ) There's a three-month period of probation for new recruits .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . If you have any question , just ask . By the way , do you know your rights and obligations in this agreement ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I know it . I wonder whether the agreement has the guarantee of law or not .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , you can believe us . Both sides should act according to the provisions of the agreement . Please sign the agreement .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ( Sign . ) OK , I signed the agreement with the signature of my name .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are done with the agreement . After a three-month probationary period , you will be confirmed in your post .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S2
